name: Nun and Light's Unreachable Forest
description:
Exploring the map with the nun, she will closely follow behind the player.
Although her assistance in battles may not be substantial,
she can offer help when she hears the voice of God.

After going through various situations, you can even go on dates with nun!
Besides her duties as a nun, you can also catch glimpses of her daily life.
Increasing your intimacy level might lead to unexpected events.

The final outcome you will face, it's all in your hands, as your choices will determine it!"



The village is in crisis due to attacks from goblins, orcs, and other so-called demi-humans.
The villagers realize the need for a large-scale cleanup and plan to burn down the demi-humans' nests.

However, Sister Hidori, who is entrusted by the church to manage the village, opposes the village's decision.

"Ladies and gentlemen, the blessings of the Lord will reach the demi-humans.
It does not wish for cruel acts.
Let us resolve this issue peacefully through dialogue!"

And so, with only one guard, the sister ventures into the depths of the forest...
Heading towards the demi-humans' dwelling.



  • Classic RPG adventure gameplay!
  • 15 basic CGs! (excluding stills)
  • More than 30 H scenes!
  • H-scenes include three elements: Fae rape/NTR/Pure Love!
  • There are three endings in total!
  • The second half of the story is filled with waves of pure love in order to highlight the fae rape and NTR!
  • You can use the blessing skill to send back to the village at any time!
  • Dialogue fast forward function
  • CG/event recall function included (needs to be purchased from the store)
